comment: /**  * Appends all the {@link org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder} bean instances that can be found in the manager.  */
code: /**  * Appends all the {@link org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder} bean instances that can be found in the manager.  */ void appendBuilders(List<RoutesBuilder> list) {     for (Bean<?> bean : manager.getBeans(RoutesBuilder.class, ANY)) {         logger.trace("Found RouteBuilder bean {}", bean).         // certain beans should be ignored         if (shouldIgnoreBean(bean)) {             logger.debug("Ignoring RouteBuilder {}", bean).             continue.         }         if (!isFilteredClass(bean)) {             logger.debug("Ignoring filtered RouteBuilder {}", bean).             continue.         }         logger.debug("Adding instantiated RouteBuilder {}", bean).         Object instance = manager.getReference(bean, RoutesBuilder.class, manager.createCreationalContext(bean)).         list.add((RoutesBuilder) instance).     } }
private boolean isFilteredClass(Bean<?> bean) {     return filter != null && filter.matches(bean.getBeanClass()). }
